preloc.hint: This string will be sent through i18n.localize(). Changing these may affect overall automation of Stealthy's effects.

spotHiddenDoors.name: Automatic hidden door detection
spotHiddenDoors.hint: Tokens can spot hidden doors if their perception check beats the door's stealth value

friendlyStealth.name: How to treat friendly tokens under stealth

playerHud.name: Players can see banked rolls
playerHud.hint: Players can see banked rolls on the token HUD but can't change them

exposure.name: Show light exposure
exposure.hint: Shows the selected token's light exposure on the Token HUD

gIDimThreshold.name: Global Illumination dim light threshold
gIDimThreshold.hint: On scenes with GI enabled, bright light exposure is assumed unless the darkness level exceeds the scene's GI threshold multiplied by this factor, yielding dim light. Use 1.0 to transition directly from bright to dark.

stealthToActor.name: Bank stealth rolls to actor
stealthToActor.hint: Bank stealth rolls in an actor effect/item rather than the token.

perceptionToActor.name: Bank perception rolls to actor
perceptionToActor.hint: Bank perception rolls in an actor effect/item rather than the token.

detectionModesMenu.name: Detection Modes
detectionModesMenu.label: Configure Detection Modes
detectionModesMenu.hint: Enable which detection modes stealth will apply to
detectionModesMenu.warning: Reload is required to apply changes to selected detection modes
detectionModesMenu.light: Is mode affected by dim vs bright lighting

source.hint: Which source to use for the Active Effect stored on the actor

ce.name: Convenient Effects
ce.afterLabel: in CE, using Stealthy's default instead

clt.name: Condition Lab & Triggler
clt.afterLabel: in CLT, using Stealthy's default instead

cpr.name: Chris's Premades
cpr.afterLabel: in CPR, using Stealthy's default instead

schema.name: Schema Version
schema.hint: Set this to a previous version to force a data migration from the specified version to the current version

endTurn.name: End Turn
endTurn.hint: End turn if you are owner of the current combatant

hiding.iconhint: Default icon for Hidden effect (ignored if using Status Effect)

perceptionDisadvantage.name: Perception disadvantage in Dim light
perceptionDisadvantage.hint: Use scene lighting to determine if perception disadvantage applies for tokens with stealth. Uses center X,Y of the token, nothing fancy

ignorePassiveFloor.name: Ignore passive perception minimum value for active checks
ignorePassiveFloor.hint: Enables a homebrew option to ignore the passive perception value when rolling an active perception check

friendlyUmbralSight.name: DEPRECATED - How to treat friendly tokens with Umbral Sight
friendlyUmbralSight.allow: Umbral Sight is hidden to Darkvision
friendlyUmbralSight.inCombat: Ignore Umbral Sight unless in combat

stealthKey.name: Stealth skill key
stealthKey.hint: Must be a key found in actor.system.skills, default is 'ste'. Used to redirect rolls from a custom skill into the stealth channel, all tooltips/etc will continue to use localize from 'stealth'

perceptionKey.name: Perception skill key
perceptionKey.hint: Must be a key found in actor.system.skills, default is 'prc'. See Stealth skill key hint but substitute perception

passiveSpotOffset.name: Assumed roll for passive spotting
passiveSpotOffset.hint: If no banked perception roll is available, assume this value for the d20 in the visibility test. Typically, -99 to auto-fail or 10 for a take-10 result.

pf2e.dependency: Stealthy requires the Hide and Seek actions from Basic Action Macros in PF2e Workbench
